about_the_game:
In-Game Video Production and Licensing:18cmSam
Game Production:Bananaking

◆The Story

You take on the role of the protagonist, a rich kid, and your father gave you a month to find a suitable person to get married. But it was not just the test of love that awaited you.

Two beautiful maid sisters, a mysterious secretary, plus your memories that had been blurry since the car accident...As you worked hard to run the company and deal with the pressure from your father, you would gradually uncover the past.

Under the dual challenges of business and love, would you be able to find true love and prove your ability through making the right choices and arrangements? More importantly, could you retrieve your lost memories and fulfill the mysterious promise you had made in high school?

A rich family dating simulation game about love, responsibility and self-discovery is waiting for you to uncover the mystery!

◆Gameplay

You can arrange work for the maids every morning; when you are at work, you can choose to interact with the maids, the secretary or trade stocks; in the evening, you can choose whether to go out, or to stay with the maids in the villa, and spend a ♀sweet♂ night.

On the 31st day, you will enter completely different endings depending on the values in the game.

◆Game features

◇ 100 full-motional CG segments, multi-angle shots, a total length of more than 90 minutes

◇ Rich static CG, including more than 50 differentials

◇ Game text: more than 100,000

◇ Three eligible female characters

◇ Game ending: 7 types, including a threesome ending

Tools for game production：Acgcreator

Tools for creating 3dcg and 3D animation ：Virtamate

name: Service of Love

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: During a business trip, I lived with two newly recruited maid sisters--the considerate Qingmei and the passionate Shiyue--together for a month. Although I had lost my memory, my little thingy was still very energetic!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, German, Russian, Thai, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
